game.name: MotoGP™23
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 스로틀을 당기고, 상대를 추월한 뒤 결승선을 통과하세요. 그 어느 때보다도 놀랍고 도전적인 요소가 가득한 MotoGP™23에서 차세대 챔피언이 되는 꿈을 이뤄보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Open the throttle, pass your opponents and cross the finish line: live the dream of being the next champion with the new MotoGP™23, more amazing and challenging than ever!

reviewHighlights.text: the physics on this game sucks, unlike 21 is so smooth
Worth every penny unless you can purchase MotoGP 26 or 24.
